chart_description: This chart displays the number of open files by different apps and services in the system.

dimension_descriptions.VMs: The name of the virtual machine hosting the app or service.
dimension_descriptions.agent_sd: The name of the agent responsible for collecting the data.
dimension_descriptions.containers: The name of the container running the app or service.
dimension_descriptions.httpd: The name of the HTTP server.
dimension_descriptions.other: Any other application or service not covered by the other dimensions.
dimension_descriptions.tc-qos-helper: The name of the tc-qos-helper service when available.
